name: Rabity Finance
description: What is Rabity Finance (RBF)? Rabity Finance is a decentralized swap on BSC chain with high APR on farming and lowest fees. Rabity Finance helps you make the most out of your crypto in three ways: Trade, Earn and Win. RBF is the delicious token that powers the Rabity Finance ecosystem. Earn RBF from Farms and Syrup Pools, win it in the lottery, or buy it on the exchange, then explore its use cases: * Stake it in Syrup Pools to earn free tokens * Use it in Yield Farms to earn more RBF * Buy Lottery tickets in the Rabity Finance Lottery * Participate in IFO Token Sales * Create your Rabity Finance Profile and mint NFTs * Vote on proposals relating to the Rabity Finance ecosystem
